Career Objective
	 (
Nidhi Pandey
210, Arsh Height,Kiwale, Mumbai 
Bangalore

nidhip1805@gmail.com
)To get a challenging and responsible job position with a reputed company that would lead me to contribute my skills and abilities in its development and to excel in this progressive software/analytics environment to my best of my potential for mutual growth and success.

	
Career Summary

	
Infosys                                                                      Since Nov – 2016 (3 Year 1 months)
Sr. Tech. Analyst (Tech. Prcs Executive)                                                                 November’16 – till date

· Worked extensively on BASE/SAS, SAS/SQL and SAS/MACROS for offering US Healthcare Insurance Services.
· Expertise in analysis which includes Requirement study for Health care Insurance domain projects, writing SAS/SQL codes and update existing system as per requirements
· Experience in data integration based on different sources, cleaning, manipulation, reporting by using different components from Base SAS, SAS/SQL, SAS/MACRO, SAS PROCS and Functions.
· Exposure to validation based on the V-Model.
· Worked on ServiceNow.
· Knowledge of SDLC models and worked as QA using ISTQB Standard.
· Knowledge of Unix.


	
Role and Responsibility

Sr. Tech. Analyst                                                                            
	
· Writing codes to generate reports using Base SAS and SQL in different formats and making predictions based on these reports
· Data manipulation using SAS/SQL functions, Proc (Proc Frequency, PROC Means, Proc Summary, Proc Content etc.)
· Develop code validation procedures, processes, job aids, tools and approaches
· Exporting/Importing data from/to MS-excel to/from SAS data set & performing Data validation, Data Cleaning & Data Manipulation by SAS/SQL procedures
· Day to day working on Base SAS  9 (Data - Step Programming, SAS functions, Base SAS, Proc SQL)
· Review final output based on client specification to identify that the result is adhering as per client requirements. Additionally, also ensuring that the best practices are getting followed while ensuring quality deliverables.
· Implementing controls to ensure quality in the project deliverables, thereby making sure that the correct premium and other fee get charged for Insurance of the opted plans. 
· If required, ensuring controls are already in place to make sure that the SLA’s are not getting hit due to bugs in the code resulting in Premiums(for employers/clients), Prices(for employees)


	
Core Skills
	
	Languages		       :
	SAS v9 (SAS/BASE, SAS/SQL, SAS/MACROS, SAS/STAT, SAS/REPORT, SAS/ODS), SAS/EG, SAS DI, SAS VA

	Reporting Tools:
	Excel, Dashboard Designer

	Database & Tools	       :

	IBM DB2, Mainframe, SAS Enterprise Guide, SAS 9.2, Ultra-Edit, ServiceNow,


	Domain Knowledge                :      
	ITSM, Technical Ticket Analysis & Reporting, BFSI





	Project Summary

	
Organization:  Infosys


Duration : 
April 2017 –  till date

Platform & Tools:  Base SAS,SAS/SQL, SAS/MACRO, Lotus Notes

Team Size: 12

	
Project Name:
Incident Ticket Analysis and Reporting

Project Description :
This is the outsource work/in-house request to do the analysis of IT Ticket Incident Analysis for our different clients. We have huge database of the different IT incident tickets. We fetch these data from database depending on the clients request doc to do the analysis and generate the report or Deck to show different trends and characteristics of the incidents or tickets generated.

Role:  Tech. System Analyst

Responsibilities: Worked as a core member of the team where I was responsible for developing new SAS codes and SQL queries to fetch data from databases, generate reports as per requirements. I was also responsible for doing ticket trend analysis based on the client’s requirement/Management need or requirements.


	
Organization:  Infosys


Duration : 
Nov 2016 – March 2017

Platform & Tools:  SQL, Lotus Notes, ServiceNow, DB2, MySql, VDI, ITSM Tools,Networking Concepts

Team Size: 20

	
Project Name:
Technical QA and Troubleshooting

Project Description :
This is a project where we are required to handle the IT tickets assigned to us where on requirement of the end user we used to support them to troubleshoot their problem related to Database connections, to setup of their software or any such system related to issue.  

Role:  System Specialist/Analyst

Responsibilities: Worked as a core member of the team where I was responsible for implementation of this project. I was responsible to understand the end user issue related to database connections, data issues, Network issues, Server Setup, taking remote access to the end user’s computer and look for the issues. 


	Personal Summary

	
Achievements / Awards
	
· Received employee of the month Award many times for quickly turning out on critical projects with quality deliverables.


	
Core Strengths
	· 
· Ability to work individually and as part of cross functional teams 
· Demonstrated decision making and problem solving skills 
· Efficient communication, written, analytical skills
· Passion to learn and improvise& Posses the quality of resilience

	
Education
	
· M.C.A (Master of Computer Application) from I.G.N.O University with 67 %.
· P.G.D.C.A (Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Application) from I.G.N.O. 
University with 64 %.
· Proficient in HSC and BSC(Mathematics) from Bihar Board & VKS University respectively 
· S.S.C. (Board of Secondary Education) from CBSE Board with 82 %.

	        Personal Details
	
· Date of Birth                 :                  February 18, 1989
· Phone No                      :                  09763084506/ 09130224767
· Marital Status               :                  Married

Neeraj Kumar Tiwari    
Phone: 8527779607

mailtoneeraj01@gmail.com

SUMMARY:

·  Overall 7.6 years of strong IT experience in Database Design, Development and Business intelligence, Data Analysis & Data Analytics and Reporting with various Business domains  like Debt Recovery,Logistic & Energy, Insurance& Health care and Media.
· Working knowledge with Stored Procedures, Triggers, Functions, Indexes, Tables, Views and other T-SQL code and SQL joins, Temp tables, SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) and SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and sound knowledge of (SSAS)
· Completely Involved In Entire business.

· Experience in developing Custom Report and different types of Tabular Reports, Matrix Reports, and drill down reports in multiple formats using SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) in Business intelligence development studio (BIDS).

· Ability to work in-groups as well as independently with minimal supervision.
· Good team player, strong interpersonal and communication skills combined with self-motivation, initiative and the ability to think outside the box.

Work Experience

Company Profile: 

 Encore Capital Group, Inc. and its subsidiaries form the 1 largest publicly traded debt buyer by revenue in the United States. It has operations and investments in 15 countries and Encore Capital Group is a global specialty finance company with operations and investments across North America, Europe, Asia and Latin America. Through its subsidiaries around the globe, Encore purchases or services portfolios of receivables from major banks, credit unions and utility providers.
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Experience in Extracting, Transforming and Loading (ETL) data from Excel, Flat file, to MS SQL Server by using DTS and SSIS services .
· Created packages in SSIS with error handling 

· Working with different methods of  in SSIS SQL server agent job monitoring and analyzing error in SSIS Catalog and find out error and resolve query.
· Developed ETL programs using Informatics to implement the business requirements.
· In SSIS catalog analysis the issue and working in Service now tools for solve this incident , through incident analysis and find out of root cause of error in SSIS catalog and SSIS package find bug and fixed the issue then resolved incident.
· Daily interaction with U.S Client through skype and Zoom meeting regarding new proposal and update, represent daily progress report (SSRS).

· Daily review incident from service now and working on development in SSIS package.

· Apart from using Scrub and VSTS using in development package in SSIS implement, Development ,UAT and QA. 
· Using T- SQL query using find sql jobs status , time gap of job, difference failed job on production in SSIS Framework database. Apart from using SQL query  like alter ,update, delete ,create using joins conditions and lots of tables, 
· Extensively worked on Bulk data load(BDL),how many files has been proceeded in production and analysis failed file, using SQL query find out of roots cause of BDL and Payment file with reason.
· Working on  the Reports as per client Requirement (SSRS) fetching report daily analysis the data , SSIS framework from to excel  and deliver report to U.S client and present the report daily basis.

· Created Parameters to achieve desired functionality.
· I also in support and development. And apart from this redefine jobs monitoring.
·  Working on Service level tools, where are lots ticket raised by client and user. I am looking on those issue and trouble shooting and error handling.

·  Daily making report of job status and number of instance of job, as BDL failure report, Job summery report,

·  Maintenance window report directly delivery to US client and set-up meeting for resolution for next step and other lot of stuff , we have to perform daily basis.
Worked with Elegant Technosoft As Senior Engineer from 3 March 2015 to 15 Feb 2019.
Project :2
+                                   
Client       
   
:
 ATCO Group 
Role


:  
BI-Consultant
                Project

:             Atco project      (Development & Support)
Team Size

:  
7
Company Profile: 

 ATCO Group is Canada group founded in true entrepreneurial spirit in 1947; ATCO has grown from its Alberta roots into a worldwide group of companies with more than 9,000 employees and assets of approximately $18 billion. ATCO's strength is in its diversity. Companies are engaged in Structures & Logistics Utilities (pipelines, natural gas and electricity transmission and distribution), and Energy (power generation and sales, natural gas gathering, processing, storage and liquids extraction).

Roles & Responsibilities:
· Created ETL packages with different data sources (SQL Server, Flat Files, Excel source files, XML files etc.) and then loaded the data into destination tables by performing different kinds of transformations using SSIS packages. 
· Creating SSIS Packages by using different data Transformations like Derived Column, Lookup, Data Conversion, Conditional Split, Pivot, Union all and Execute SQL Task to load data into Database.
· Import own data through Zina-BI tools connects from on Directory folder such as flat file, excel file  and automatically creates dashboards and reports for you. You can also import Excel workbooks from OneDrive or your computer.
·  Developing database applications which are automated & Identifying issues with the database and resolving them

· Planning and implementing capacity expansion in order to ensure that the company’s databases are scalable

· Created Stored Procedures, Triggers, Functions, Indexes, Tables, Views and other T-SQL code and SQL joins, Temp tables for applications. 
· Scheduled and maintain packages by daily, weekly and monthly using SQL Server Agent in SSMS. 

· Generating drill through reports, drill down reports, parameterized reports, linked reports, sub reports, table, matrix, charts in SSRS 2012.
· Scheduling the jobs to send the reports, working on Power BI reporting with SSRS.
Worked in Bajaj Capital Ltd as IT Operation Exe. from June 2012 to  To Feb 2015.

Company Profile:
Bajaj Capital Limited, a financial services company, provides investment advisory and financial planning services to individual investors, corporate houses, institutional investors, Non-Resident Indians (NRIs), and High Net worth clients, and high net worth clients in India. And Insurance, Tax Saving, Retirement Planning, Future Planning for Children and more.
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Importing, gathering and mapping different Insurance transaction through all over India Branches using Extraction,tranformation and loading(ETL) through SSIS in SQL server.

· Experienced in Extracting, Transforming and Loading (ETL) data from Excel, Flat file, to MS SQL Server by using DTS and SSIS services. 
· Used Informatics Power Center for (ETL) extraction, transformation and loading data from heterogeneous source systems into target database. 
· Used T SQL queries and functions and update the database and worked on join, functions, index, stored procedure, trigger.
· Monitored the performance of the database and checked on the execution time

· Developed various SQL servers and ensured that they were properly maintained and supported

· Analyzed the Informatics mappings for Source to Target for Data Analysis.

· Handling 5 Member of team As Team Leader and In streamline accomplish the task.

· Daily reporting to Manger and, AVP. and resolve the Software query.
· Using Excel advance functions for representing Data into graphical presentations like Graphs, Pivot Table and functions like VLOOKUP, Hookup, IF, ELSEIF etc

· Created complex reports utilizing the features like hierarchy, New Calculated Columns, Drill functionality, Tables, graphs, line Charts and Bar Charts 
Worked in Zee Network  As Transmission Officer  from Nov 2010 to  To May 2012 .

Zee Network Limited (formerly Zee Telefilms Limited) is an Indian mass media company owned by Essel Group. Headquartered in Mumbai, it has interests in television, print, internet, film, mobile content and allied businesses.
Roles & Responsibilities:
· Making various kind of report for production, quality, of the employee like as target vs achievement, RNR report, quality report ,BMQ report, attendance vs Professional and lot of report

·  Maintain data in report daily, weekly, monthly bases in report with using advance excel formulas and VBA tools.
· Created PL/SQL module which was used to integrate the existing data from third parties and on to the database

· Came up with several programs so as to ensure that there was correct data transfer

· Daily coordination with U.S client & European Client regarding problem case and business requirement analysis.

Professional Summary: 

 1 year experience on MS SQL Server as a database designer and SQL developer.  
 Currently working on SQL Server 2008 & 2007. 
 Expertise writing stored procedure, functions and views. 
 Experience in writing and tuning complex sub queries, Stored Procedures, Functions, Cursors and triggers. 
 Good experience in T-SQL. 

Current Employer: 

 BAANS Consulting Services(Nov 2018-till date) 

Academic Qualifications: 
 

Qualification Year of Passing University/Board 

Bachelor of Science 2016 DBRAU, Agra 

Intermediate (12th) 2012 U.P. Board 

Matriculation (10th) 2010 U.P. Board 

 

Professional Qualification: 

 GNIIT Software Engineering Course from NIIT in 2018. 

Project Details: 

 
Project: NOLEASH NEEDED 
 
Description: 
 
Noleash Needed works in US for the reservations of dogs like Day camp reservation, Boarding reservation, Fitness 
reservations etc. This project consist of mainly two modules like 
 

 In first module, the client who wants to make their dog’s reservation contacts to NLN team and tell them the 
entire details of dog like dog’s vaccinations, dog’s image and the date of reservation when dog will go to the 
Noleash. After using the services of Noleash the client will get the invoice. 
 

 In second module, Noleash provides a site to the clients to fill all the details themselves and make or cancel 
the reservation as they want. 

 
Role: SQL Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 

 Understanding the Requirements and workflow of the application. 
 Creating Procedures, Views and Functions in SQL server as per the requirements. 
 Used pivot, unpivot, cursors, triggers, functions and procedures. 
 Used hash tables to store temporary data. 
 Designed from scratch the table architecture of the database. 
 Responsible for management of the complete database. 
 Responsible for management of Cursors, Triggers, Procedures. 
 Responsible for Production deployment and its management. 
 Created Reports using Itextsharp. 
 

 
Technologies: .NET, C#, JQuery, CSS, SQL Server. 
 
 
 



Project : GOFORCLOSE 
 
Description: 
 
This is a Web Application made on MVC Platform which can be used for tracing contact number and email of

Project Details: 

 
Project: NOLEASH NEEDED 
 
Description: 
 
Noleash Needed works in US for the reservations of dogs like Day camp reservation, Boarding reservation, Fitness 
reservations etc. This project consist of mainly two modules like 
 

 In first module, the client who wants to make their dog’s reservation contacts to NLN team and tell them the 
entire details of dog like dog’s vaccinations, dog’s image and the date of reservation when dog will go to the 
Noleash. After using the services of Noleash the client will get the invoice. 
 

 In second module, Noleash provides a site to the clients to fill all the details themselves and make or cancel 
the reservation as they want. 

 
Role: SQL Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 

 Understanding the Requirements and workflow of the application. 
 Creating Procedures, Views and Functions in SQL server as per the requirements. 
 Used pivot, unpivot, cursors, triggers, functions and procedures. 
 Used hash tables to store temporary data. 
 Designed from scratch the table architecture of the database. 
 Responsible for management of the complete database. 
 Responsible for management of Cursors, Triggers, Procedures. 
 Responsible for Production deployment and its management. 
 Created Reports using Itextsharp. 
 

 
Technologies: .NET, C#, JQuery, CSS, SQL Server.
